page.title: 06OUTSTANDING BUILDINGS-CONT.
page.content: accomodate older children evacuated from{Clydebank.A}new school was opened in 1970 and it has five more classrooms plus an assembly hall.Cubs, Brownies,Judo and Country Dancing all take place in the hall.There are 169 pupils and 7 teachers in the school at the moment. As well asthese buildings there are two landmarks on the beach. One of these is known as{Tut-Tut}and is a large boulder painted to resemble a head.This has existed for many years but a few years ago another rock was painted and named{JAWS.} In front of the Burgh Hall is the War Memorial which lists the names of those who died in both World Wars.Each year a service is held there on November 11th.Many people attend although few now know those whose names are on the Memorial
